info.title: AWS IoT RoboRunner
info.description: An example service, deployed with the Octane Service creator, which will echo the string

servers.description: The AWS IoT RoboRunner multi-region endpoint
The AWS IoT RoboRunner multi-region endpoint
The AWS IoT RoboRunner endpoint for China (Beijing) and China (Ningxia)
The AWS IoT RoboRunner endpoint for China (Beijing) and China (Ningxia)
